case.name: SZISF v Minister for Immigration and Multicultural Affairs [2006] FCA 1462 (6 November 2006)

citphrases.citphrase: motion to reopen judgment of single judge where applicant did not appear at hearing
where judge dismissed application and refused leave on basis of no prospects of success
discussion of court's power to set aside judgment of single judge exercising appellate jurisdiction

citances.sentence: 1 On 15 November 2006 a notice of motion was filed in this Court seeking to reopen a judgment of Lander J of 6 November 2006: see SZISF v Minister for Immigration and Multicultural Affairs [2006] FCA 1462.
